docs.title: Dual Narration Research ProjectResearch Documentation
docs.text: A collection of working notes, experiments, and analysis for the Dual Narration project. Clean, organized, and constantly evolving.

docs.title: Latest Posts
docs.text:
Initial Research Notes

First exploration of dual narration techniques and their applications in modern storytelling frameworks.

📅 Jan 15, 2024 🕒 5 min read Research Notes Methodology Framework

Developing a systematic approach to analyze dual narration patterns across different media types.

📅 Jan 20, 2024 🕒 8 min read Theory Analysis Experiment 01: Baseline Testing

First experimental implementation testing basic dual narration concepts with control groups.

📅 Jan 25, 2024 🕒 12 min read Experiment Implementation Data Analysis Pipeline

Building automated tools for processing and analyzing dual narration data sets efficiently.

📅 Feb 01, 2024 🕒 6 min read Analysis Implementation Progress Notes - Week 5

Weekly update on research progress, challenges encountered, and next steps in the investigation.

📅 Feb 05, 2024 🕒 3 min read Notes Research Theoretical Framework v2

Refined theoretical model incorporating feedback from initial experiments and literature review.

📅 Feb 10, 2024 🕒 10 min read Theory Research
